item.title: Instagram Reels Video Editor - Podcast Trailer & Clips - Diary of a CEO style - Upwork
item.description:
Hey, I am hiring for an experienced short form video editor specialised with podcast clips and who can also do the Diary of a CEO style of clip. I have multiple clients who do podcasts so there is potential for plenty of work.

The ideal quality is something as close to what you’d see on the channel “Diary of a CEO” - referring to the trailer. Edits will need to be fast paced, high quality and engaging.

Only apply if you can reproduce this style. You must also be able to communicate effectively and turnaround videos within the deadlines.

Please share 2 examples of podcast trailers you have edited and add the word “clippa” at the top of your proposal to be considered.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Are you a bit twisted and enjoy the bizarre things in life? You need to be our video content creator - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a twisted videographer in the US preferably near the bay area if possible. You have vision. You have edge. You're a killer storyteller. We want to create bizarre, provocative, surreal video content.

Rapid fire reaction shots of people silently struggling for words with a variety of exaggerated expressions ranging from perhaps: shock, confusion, seemingly inspired, amazed, exalted, moved to tears, etc. These people are staring at something we can't see or...we may show a spotlight or one flickering light bulb as if they're being interrogated.

You will be bold as you will need to enter various places where there is meant to be silence and you create chaos. Think you've got it in you? Then please reply to this post.

I look forward to hearing from you.

Kind regards,
Lisa



Hourly Range: $12.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:02 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Fine Art, People, Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Camera
Skills: Fine Art, People, Video Production, Video Editing, Videography, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Camera
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for LONG TERM Video Editor/ Compilations to Compile Visuals/ Minor Animations - Upwork
item.description:
Videos will MUST be 8 minutes UNLESS otherwise indicated.

I'm looking for a long term article video editor who can compile clips and images to match a script that we provide related to the following topics:
Celebrity News/Scandals

Video editor should be able to do the following:
* Speak fluent English
* Communicate effectively
* Turn around time in 3 days or less
* Be creative and humorous
* MUST be able to edit a MINIMUM of at least 4 videos a week.

If you have read the middle of this job descp., please type your favorite animal at the beginning or end of your proposal.

As you can tell, I am looking for the long-term video editor and do have high expectations, but keep in mind, this will be consistent daily work if you are able to provide and this will be compensated quite well.  We have been working with 4 video editors already for 3+ months but we need more to join our team!

Again, we will be providing the script and voiceover, we will simply need visuals for it and for it to be put together nicely and creatively with some slight animations (i.e. for the title screens)

So for the first type of video, here is what we’re looking, below is our best preforming video so far:  
https://youtu.be/PaMfCczuO6k?si=AUsT7E1S7mhr6Z6_

TAKE NOTE how it has the following:
-THE BEGINNING OF THE VIDEO- Show a clip that is EXTREMELY relevant to the title, essentially a clip with audio (OPTIONAL: only do this if you understand the niche)
-Show the numbers with appeal and emphasis; if it’s not a countdown script, show the subheadings
-Video editor will need to find 3 types of visuals: clips w/ audio, clips w/o audio, and images
-All visuals can be ripped but should never last longer than 6 seconds
-Entire video should be greater than 8 minutes unless otherwise indicated
-Background music should be copyright free
-Show AT LEAST 1 clip with audio every minute afterwards

This is our GUIDELINE that we follow across all our videos.

Potential contractors will be interviewed through phone.

Here are more examples of videos we need done similar to:
https://youtu.be/inZUuUZFKIY?si=YjV8VJ2-xZh3v2c3
https://youtu.be/KtXF96oWZV8?si=gA8Sen0XvdVBjV_z
https://youtu.be/UvDNf7rtajE?si=FdoS98ZreTQsuCqA


Please also read our Standard Operating Procedure Thoroughly.


Additional Questions:
Are you okay with the rate of $100 for 5 videos?
How many videos can you handle per week?
To the best of your understanding, can you rephrase what kind of video I am seeking?
You will be instantly hired if you created a top 10 or faceless youtube videos before. Have you created one?


Budget: $40
Posted On: June 21, 2024 03:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Faceless UGC Video Creator for Photo/Video Equipment Reviews - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for talented creators to produce faceless UGC (User-Generated Content) videos reviewing photography or videography equipment that YOU OWN and  available on Amazon, priced over $200.

Requirements:
- Each video must be at least 1 minute long.
- The video should be faceless, meaning your face should not be shown.
- You will hold the product in hand from a POV (point of view) position.
- Record yourself using the product (don’t just hold up the product in a box and talk about it).
- In the video, discuss the product’s features, your likes, and one dislike.
- Must be a native English speaker.
- Must be an original review video (do not provide a video you previously reviewed for yourself or someone else).
- Each Product reviewed must be over $200

Payment:
- $25 per video.

Instructions:
1. Choose photography or videography equipment over $200 from Amazon.
2. Record a faceless POV video using the product.
3. Discuss the product’s features, your likes, and one dislike.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 21, 2024 03:47 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Influencer Marketing, Video Production, Product Review
Skills: Testimonial Video, Influencer Marketing, Video Production, Product Review
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
